pages.text: In order to make any progress here, I will need to discover and artificially create $(marked)Essences$().ยง(br)In order to do so, I will have to dedicate myself to $(marked)Matter Manipulation$(), starting with a $(l:manipulation/entry_pedestal)$(item)Lightning Pedestal$() to create $(l:lessons/lesson_collection)$(marked)Primal Essences$()

Once I have discovered a primal essence, it should be easier to discover other ways of matter manipulation, so that I can create simple compound essences. $(br)Once I have a lot of those, I can dedicate myself to the more complex compounds.
While creating compound aspects may seem a bit like a lot of experimentation, I could probably take some time and observe the nature of these aspects. $(br)This could help me.
